nodes.text: King Mon Julpa led his planet's fleet from a command ship during the Battle of Tammuz-an.

The vessel appeared slightly different from the only other Tammuz-an capital ship seen, lacking a stern protrusion and having several smaller bow protrusions, which might have been connected to its weapons-systems.

The bridge area was located underneath the main superstructure, with a command area similar to many other warships. The controllers and technicians were seated at consoles arranged around the main walking area.
During the Battle of Tammuz-an, King Julpa's fleet was led by this vessel, which participated in the frontline action against Gir Kybo Ren-Cha's stolen Star Destroyer, the Demolisher.
